attributes.action: support adoption of global sustainability standards for biofuels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
13-03-2008

At this weekend's (Mar 15/16) G20 Gleneagles Dialogue,the climate change discussions leading up to this summer's G8 summit take place. Please support the adoption of global sustainability standards for biofuels. These standards must ensure that biofuels do not undermine food security or cause more carbon emissions than they prevent. Some biofuels are good, others are a disaster--and our policies must tell the difference between the two.

Sincerely,

Hans
